rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Small area adjacent to the front door for receiving guests and storage.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open concept living space with integrated kitchen, oriented east for natural light and Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room for daily meals, ensuring a clear view of the entrance for auspicious beginnings.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: Spacious area dedicated to fitness, located on the ground floor with natural light and ventilation. Designed with eco-friendly finishes and proper insulation.

openings.description: A welcoming door aligned with the entrance hall and adhering to Vastu guidelines.
Large windows on the east side for optimal sunlight and ventilation, following eco-friendly practices.
Skylight openings integrated into the roof design to allow natural light during workouts.
A door connecting the dining area to the kitchen, ensuring smooth flow and accessibility.
